name: EconodayUSEconomicFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The Econoday Flash Brief keeps you up to date throughout the day by delivering U.S. economic, treasury, speech announcements and analysis directly to you through Alexa no matter where you go. You can also check out the U.S. economic online calendar at mam.econoday.com. For comments, suggestions or help, please email us at support@econoday.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
